snippet: After hearing that the Trinidad and Tobago women’s soccer team needed money, Haiti’s team donated the money in its fund-raising account to the competition.
lead_paragraph: After hearing that the Trinidad and Tobago women’s soccer team needed money, Haiti’s team donated the money in its fund-raising account to the competition.

headline.main: Haiti Pledges Money to Trinidad and Tobago Women’s Soccer Team
headline.print_headline: Haiti pledges money to Trinidad and Tobago soccer

keywords.value: Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
keywords.name: organizations
